statements: SELECT * FROM SmartMeterData WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, consumption_kwh FROM SmartMeterData WHERE reading_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SmartMeterData WHERE voltage > 220.5;
SELECT reading_date, reading_time FROM SmartMeterData WHERE consumption_kwh < 100;
SELECT id, meter_id, reading_date, voltage FROM SmartMeterData ORDER BY reading_date DESC, reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM SmartMeterData WHERE reading_date = '2021-10-25';
SELECT id, reading_date, consumption_kwh FROM SmartMeterData WHERE voltage > 220 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(consumption_kwh) AS average_consumption, meter_id FROM SmartMeterData GROUP BY meter_id HAVING average_consumption > 50;
SELECT reading_date, SUM(consumption_kwh) AS total_consumption FROM SmartMeterData GROUP BY reading_date ORDER BY total_consumption DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meter_id, AVG(voltage) AS avg_voltage FROM SmartMeterData GROUP BY meter_id HAVING avg_voltage < 200 ORDER BY avg_voltage ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data;
SELECT reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM smart_meter_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT meter_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM smart_meter_data GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT distribution_point, current_load FROM energy_distribution WHERE voltage_level = 220;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution ORDER BY distribution_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_meter_data WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT meter_id, COUNT(*) FROM smart_meter_data GROUP BY meter_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
SELECT reading_timestamp, AVG(reading_value) FROM smart_meter_data GROUP BY reading_timestamp ORDER BY AVG(reading_value) ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE current_load < 50 AND voltage_level = 220
SELECT distribution_point, AVG(current_load) FROM energy_distribution GROUP BY distribution_point ORDER BY AVG(current_load) DESC
SELECT meter_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code, install_date FROM smart_meters;
SELECT reading_id, meter_id, reading_date, reading_value FROM meter_readings WHERE reading_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM smart_meters WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT meter_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading_value FROM meter_readings GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters
SELECT meter_id, street_address, city FROM smart_meters WHERE state = 'NY' ORDER BY street_address ASC
SELECT meter_id, reading_value, reading_date FROM meter_readings WHERE reading_date > '2021-01-01' AND reading_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY reading_value DESC

SELECT smart_meters.meter_id, smart_meters.street_address, meter_readings.reading_date, meter_readings.reading_value FROM smart_meters INNER JOIN meter_readings ON smart_meters.meter_id = meter_readings.meter_id WHERE meter_readings.reading_value > 100 ORDER BY meter_readings.reading_value DESC

SELECT smart_meters.street_address, smart_meters.city, SUM(energy_consumption.consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM smart_meters INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON smart_meters.meter_id = energy_consumption.meter_id WHERE smart_meters.state = 'CA' GROUP BY smart_meters.street_address, smart_meters.city ORDER BY total_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT location, manufacturer FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM electricity_readings ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM electricity_readings GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(consumed_energy) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM smart_meters ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT meter_id, manufacturer, installation_date FROM smart_meters WHERE manufacturer='ABC Corp' AND installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT reading_id, reading_date, reading_value FROM electricity_readings WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT meter_id, date, consumed_energy FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumed_energy > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, anomaly_date, description FROM anomalies WHERE meter_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM smart_meters
SELECT location, install_date FROM smart_meters
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM energy_providers
SELECT reading_value, reading_date FROM readings
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT reading_value, reading_date FROM readings WHERE meter_id=101 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_name='ABC Energy' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT meter_id, usage_date, usage_value FROM usage_history WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
